Plot: Following her boyfriend's suicide, supermarket clerk Morvern Callar passes off his unpublished novel as her own. With the money her boyfriend left for his funeral, she leaves Scotland for ...
Title: Morvern Callar
Writer: Liana Dognini, Lynne Ramsay, Alan Warner (novel)
Actors: Samantha Morton, Kathleen McDermott, Paul Popplewell, Ruby Milton
tomatoConsensus: Morton quietly makes this quirky, enigmatic mood piece a compelling watch.
